firstly, in a tall glass add 2 tsp of soaked sabja seeds.
furthermore, add rose syrup along the edges of the glass. this will make your glass look more attractive.
then pour the prepared rose milk. do not pour it fully, as we are going to add ice cream.
carefully place 2 tsp of strawberry jelly. so the milk doesn’t splash out.
also top with a scoop of vanilla ice-cream.
finally, garnish with chopped dry fruits and tutti frutti.
Some guacamole recipes call for many ingredients and can be a pain to prepare. This super simple guac can be thrown together in a couple of minutes and tastes great.
2 tsp basil seeds / sabja seeds / tukmaria seeds
2 tbsp rose syrup, add as required
